General.Name: Xinjiang Youhao Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Youhao(Group)Co.,Ltd operates as a commercial retail enterprise in China. It operates shopping centers, department stores, supermarkets, convenience stores, electric appliance stores, and gourmet dining chain. The company also engages in travel agency, logistics, commercial service, and real estate development and sale, as well as retailing of petroleum products and lubricants. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Urumqi, China.
General.Address: No. 668, Youhao South Road, Urumqi, China, 830000

6.Name: Mr. Lei  Shi
